H0.text: Time is what a light-year measures.

H1.text: Mass is what a light-year measures.

H2.text: Distance is what a lightâ€‘year measures.

H3.text: Brightness is what a light-year measures.

A4.text: A light-year, alternatively spelled light year (ly or lyr), is a unit of length used to express astronomical distances

A5.text: Despite its inclusion of the word 'year', the term should not be misinterpreted as a unit of time
